name: I Have No Nose and I Must Climb
name_original: I Have No Nose and I Must Climb
description:
I Have No Nose and I Must Climb is a 2D Precision Platformer where you use the control sticks to operate a pair of hands to overcome various platforming challenges. Reach the top to of the world to help Wally retrieve their nose!

Sling from walls and ledges to maneuver around different obstacles, Throw out a Thumbs up to pass through special barriers or fly high into the air off a bouncy mushroom.

Inspired by titles like Getting over it with Bennet Foddy, Jump King, and Pogostuck.
